info.author: Mark Summerfield
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Python Software Foundation License
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This turtle package also offers some cartesian oriented functions. This
is useful to help people move from the turtle model to a cartesian model.
info.name: turtle2.py
info.summary: An alternative to Python's standard turtle package with some extra functions.
info.html_description: This turtle package also offers some cartesian oriented functions. This is useful to help people move from the turtle model to a cartesian model.
